verbs.description: [V: astros] [ARG1: star] alex bregman and his connection with ted williams as the houston astros were taking batting practice before game 1 of the american league championship series last week carlos correa and george springer looked out at the lone red seat in right field at fenway park and wondered aloud if the old story was true did ted williams really hit a ball that far no chance they agreed alex bregman standing a few feet away smiled he knew better houston star third baseman grew up in a alex bregman ted astros alex bregman baseball ted williams red sox
